sentences.en: A marriage has been arranged between Mr. Brown and Miss Whit.
sentences.cn: 布朗先生与怀特小姐的婚礼已筹备好了.

sentences.en: Compared whit a decade ago, our life is much better than before.
sentences.cn: 和十年前相比, 我们现在的生活要幸福很多.

sentences.en: He did not seem a whit concerned.
He was wearing a whit tie with black stripes.
sentences.cn: 他戴着一条黑条纹的领带.

sentences.en: I don't care a whit whether she stays or not.
I'd like to confirm Ms. Byrons's appointment whit Mr. smith next afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我想确认一下史密斯先生和拜伦女士明天下午的约会.

sentences.en: John was no whit less friendly for all that.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此,约翰的友好态度还是丝毫未变.

sentences.en: John: What are you going to do whit that vase, Mary?
sentences.cn: 约翰: 玛丽,你打算拿花瓶做什么?

sentences.en: my mother was fond of her and I shall be every whit as fond.
sentences.cn: 过去我母亲喜欢她，我也会完完全全像母亲一样喜欢她。

sentences.en: Sara had not changed a whit.
Style: Light bodied whit wine, smooth and mellow texture with long finish.
sentences.cn: 风格: 酒体轻盈, 口感柔顺,余韵悠长.

sentences.en: The hostess is every whit as elegant as a lady.
sentences.cn: 女主人完完全全像贵妇人一样高雅.

sentences.en: The orchestra gave its first performance on Whit Monday.
sentences.cn: 乐团在周一的圣灵降临节举行了首场演出。

sentences.en: The stables were sluiced out whit water from a hose.
sentences.cn: 马厩已用水龙管冲洗过.

sentences.en: There is an old , whit two - story house on the leftsidecross the bridge.
sentences.cn: 在我快要下桥的地方的左边有一座白色的老式二层小楼.

sentences.en: We hope to cooperate and create tomorrow whit our customers!
sentences.cn: 我们愿与广大顾客朋友携手合作,共创明天!

sentences.en: Whit her dark skin eyes, I took her for an Italian.
sentences.cn: 她的深色皮肤及眼睛, 我误以为她是意大利人.

trans.tran_cn: 极少的量，一点儿，丝毫不，一点也不
